version_description:
*** ИНТЕРАКТИВНАЯ КАРТА АЭРОПОРТА ***

В Помощнике путешественника теперь можно открыть интерактивную карту, которая с помощью функций навигации и поиска поможет быстро определить оптимальный маршрут при передвижении по аэропорту Мюнхена. При этом на карте будет автоматически отображаться кратчайший путь для каждого конкретного случая.

Пока эта услуга доступна только для аэропорта Мюнхена, но планируется ее внедрение и в других аэропортах.
*Hotfix for the incorrect display of Egypt local time in the flight status affecting iOS versions 9.3.3 and 9.3.4.

*** Travel document scan ***

Easily capture your entry documents in the “Personal Data” section by scanning them with your camera. You can also use the scan function when adding passport information to your booking at a later time.

*** Optimized flight booking ***

Based on your feedback, we have adjusted flight booking: Improved display of the booking with price guarantee and seat selection, as well as minor bug fixes and usability improvements.

*** Error-free password entry ***

Log in faster successfully: Have your password displayed and avoid typing errors.

*** Orientation made easy ***

Find an overview of the most important features of your app under the “About this app” menu item: Which notifications can I sign up for? What does the iOS widget do? How do I use the passport scanner and where can I find it in the app? Find useful tips and information here.

*** ENTERTAINMENT ***

Pretty entertaining: as soon as you have your mobile boarding pass, you will receive information about entertainment offers straight to the inbox of the app via a push message: includes links to the eJournal download and the topic of internet on board.

*** TRAVEL DOCUMENT SCAN ***

Passport, identity card, visa or residence permit? For a quick check-in process by app you can simply capture your or your fellow passenger's travel documents by scanning them via your camera. This saves tedious typing-in as the fields are automatically pre-filled.
Minor bug fixes

*** HOMESCREEN FLIGHT STATUS ***

Everything at a glance: search for and subscribe to a flight via your app homescreen. Then you can follow the flight's status on your app homescreen and keep up-to-date without having to search again.

*** INFLIGHT DATA ***

See information on speed, altitude, outside temperature, remaining distance while on board a European flight with Internet on board, also on Apple Watch.
Thank you for your feedback – we have fixed the bug for Apple Watch

*** CASH & MILES ***

Now you can pay for your Lufthansa Group flights either in full or in part with your Miles & More award miles. You can decide for yourself how many miles you would like to redeem when booking your flight.

*** Offline Login ***
No network? No problem!
With the app your most important information is now also available offline. Stay logged in even without a connection.

*** Lufthansa iD ***
Your access to Lufthansa's digital channels: simply log in with your email address and manage your flights and settings quickly and easily – anytime, anywhere.

*** Extra Baggage ***
New to the app: if you are travelling on the Light fare, you can now easily and conveniently add an extra piece of baggage to your booking.

6.2.1

Kleinere Fehlerbehebungen

6.2.0

*** Offline Login ***
No network? No problem!
With the app your most important information is now also available offline. Stay logged in even without a connection.

*** Lufthansa iD ***
Your access to Lufthansa's digital channels: simply log in with your email address and manage your flights and settings quickly and easily – anytime, anywhere.

*** Extra Baggage ***
New to the app: if you are travelling on the Light fare, you can now easily and conveniently add an extra piece of baggage to your booking.

*** Cash Upgrade ***

Would you like to travel in a higher class? No problem, because you can now easily upgrade your existing and intended booking to a higher travel class within the app.

*** Inflight Data & FlyNet ***

On board your European flight you can now not only have interesting flight data displayed, but also access FlyNet® directly from the app and surf the Net at your leisure. Your time on board will simply fly by.

*** Destination picture ***

Be inspired!
Shortly before your trip a selected picture of your destination will appear as your app background image.

*** Digital Maps ***

Interactive airport maps are now available for Zurich airport, as well as for Munich. Just go to Info & Service or go to the Flight Monitor.
Adaptions for iOS 11

Adaptions for iPhone X and iOS 11

*** LH iD Registration ***

From now on, you can register very easily for your Lufthansa iD account via the app’s welcome screen.

Minor bug fixes

*** Rate the crew ***

You can now give your crew a rating using the Travel Assistant on the Lufthansa app.

Adaptions for iPhone X and iOS 11

*** LH iD Registration ***

From now on, you can register very easily for your Lufthansa iD account via the app’s welcome screen.

Bugfix for frequent Bluetooth permission request

*** Airport map ***

The interactive airport map is now even easier to find:
From today, you can access the interactive airport map for certain routes in your Travel Assistant, directly beside the corresponding airport code.

*** 行李状态功能 ***

现在起，对所有承运您行李的参与服务的星空联盟航空公司均可使用行李状态功能。

***评价机组人员***

您现在可以使用汉莎航空App应用程序中的旅行助手对机组人员进行评价。

Minor bug fixes

*** Rate the crew ***

You can now give your crew a rating using the Travel Assistant on the Lufthansa app.

*** Flight review ***

Give us your feedback on your flight experience after landing. Help us improve our high standards even more by giving us your feedback.

*** Design update ***

Discover the fresh, new design when you select flights in our booking process.

*** Fresh Look ***

The Lufthansa app now has new colours.

*** Flight review ***

Give us your feedback on your flight experience after landing. Help us improve our high standards even more by giving us your feedback.

*** Design update ***

Discover the fresh, new design when you select flights in our booking process.

*** Airport Maps ***

To make it even easier for you to find your way around, we improved our interactive airport maps .

*** Data Protection ***

We adapted our services to become EU GDPR compliant.
General optimization and bug fixes

*** Cash&Miles ***

The Cash&Miles feature is now also available for flights operated by Lufthansa partner airlines.

*** Payment Methods ***

For our customers resident in Russia and Belgium we offer further well-known payment methods that can be used to purchase flight tickets and additional services.

*** Airport Maps ***

To make it even easier for you to find your way at the airport, we have made further improvements to the navigation in our interactive airport maps. This service is now also offered to our passengers at Frankfurt Airport.

"Hey, Siri, my flight."
The Lufthansa app now provides you with all relevant information for your flight as a time-dependent Siri Shortcut, such as your flight status, the remaining time until boarding or your boarding pass.

"Hey, Siri, my flight."
The Lufthansa app now provides you with all relevant information for your flight as a time-dependent Siri Shortcut, such as your flight status, the remaining time until boarding or your boarding pass.

***Miles & More service card ***

You can now access your service card directly via the Lufthansa App which you can use to check in and access the lounges at the airport.


***Push Notifications***

To make sure you don't miss out on the latest offers, notifications you have subscribed are automatically saved in the Lufthansa App and you can decide when you want to read them.


***Hey, Siri, my flight.***

The Lufthansa app now provides you with all relevant information for your flight as a time-dependent Siri Shortcut, such as your flight status, the remaining time until boarding or your boarding pass.
General optimization and bug fixes

*** Airport Maps***

For better orientation at the airport, you can now use the airport maps also when being offline. Newly available: Airport Map New York (JFK).

*** Design update ***

Discover the new Lufthansa design in our booking flow now also in the multi-stop flights selection and benefit from the improved flight overview and flight selection.

*** Siri shortcut ***

In addition, we now offer you the possibility to call up your digital service card by voice command.
General optimization and bug fixes
General optimization and bug fixes
Minor bug fixes

*** Aircraft origin ***
We will now inform you from which airport the aircraft of your next trip is coming from.

*** iPad Pro Support ***
We have optimized the appearance of the app to support the iPad Pro.

*** Aircraft origin ***
 
We will now inform you from which airport the aircraft of your next trip is coming from.

*** iPad Pro Support ***
 
We have optimized the appearance of the app to support the iPad Pro.

*** Favorites ***
 
Booking your recurring flights has just become even easier. From now on you can add them as favorites within the Lufthansa App, saving you time during your next flight search.

*** FlyNet Voucher ***
 
It is now possible to purchase FlyNet vouchers for your checked-in flights.

*** Siri Shortcuts ***
 
We have expanded the Siri Shortcuts. With the voice command “My flight”, the Lufthansa App can now inform you from which belt you can collect your luggage (only at selected airports). With the voice command “My bookings” you can also directly retrieve your bookings.

*** Smart Bag for iPad ***

Now also available on your iPad: you can conveniently check in your Smart Bag from Rimowa or BAGTAG from home via the Lufthansa App.

*** App Menu ***

We have organized our App menu for easier orientation so that you can quickly find what you need.

*** Siri Shortcuts ***

From now on, your flight status requests can be saved as Siri Shortcuts. This allows you to access information even faster.

Fixes for app crashes on iOS 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

*** App Menu ***

We have organized our App menu for easier orientation so that you can quickly find what you need.

*** Siri Shortcuts ***

From now on, your flight status requests can be saved as Siri Shortcuts. This allows you to access information even faster.
Restored access to your bookings from the "Personal Travel Assistant"
Solved issues with the access to your bookings and also with the display of flight status on iPads with iOS 13

*** Fully Flexible Booking ***

Do you want to maximize your mileage credit or stay flexible at any time? The highest fares can now be easily booked and are available under "Book Flights".

*** Integration of Chatbot in Travel Assistant ***

The "Personal Travel Assistant" contains all the relevant information about your flight and now also offers you the opportunity to communicate with the Facebook chatbot. This will allow you to quickly get answers to frequently asked questions.
Issues during update of the boarding pass after seat selection fixed.
Fix implemented for RIMOWA Electronic Tags and now works again with iOS 13.

*** New design for Miles & More account statement ***

All customers with Miles & More accounts can now benefit from a new design of the account statement. With the new display, the current mileage amount and related transactions can be reviewed with ease.

*** The special meal selection is available again on applicable routes. ***

*** Optimizations for login related functionalities. ***

*** New Design and Features available for the Homescreen and Booking Details ***

A new intuitive design that displays all relevant information for your next trip even more prominently. Especially in times of corona, the access to your flight information, check-in and mobile boarding pass is now more convenient. In addition, we offer a quick entry point directly from the homescreen for future flight searches.

*** The boarding pass keeps you up to date ***

You can now easily stay up to date with automatically refreshed departure and boarding times displayed on your boarding pass, in case there are any changes for your flight.

*** Fix provided for access to the flight status from the booking details and mobile boarding pass. ***

*** New design of your Travel Assistant ***

All your trip related information can now be found with even more ease.

*** Modify your booking search ***

With the new more prominent edit function, you can easily search for different flight options and modify your flight search.

*** How about a little something extra? ***

With our additional services you can make your trip even more individual and comfortable. Our new design allows you to see all your options at a glance.

*** Convenient date selection ***

Date selection is now comfortable again with calendar view selection.

*** New design of your Travel Assistant ***

All your trip related information can now be found with even more ease.

*** Modify your booking search ***

With the new more prominent edit function, you can easily search for different flight options and modify your flight search.

*** How about a little something extra? ***

With our additional services you can make your trip even more individual and comfortable. Our new design allows you to see all your options at a glance.

*** Convenient date selection ***

Date selection is now comfortable again with calendar view selection.
Issues fixed when opening the app from Siri suggestions on iOS 14

*** Save time, use favorites ***

Add and use your favorites via the homescreen to book flights even more efficiently.

*** Want to get in touch? ***

You need personal assistance, information regarding your next trip or wish to provide feedback? It is now even easier to get in touch using our new Help and Contact area.

*** Meal Voucher Activation on Your Boarding Pass ***

Conveniently use your boarding pass as a meal voucher in case of a flight irregularity. Simply present it at a restaurant.

*** Discover even more ***

Many new features offered for flight searches.

*** Electronic Bag Tag Redesign ***
This feature has been completely redesigned, now also supporting the next generation of Electronic Bag Tags.

*** General optimization and bug fixes ***

*** Travel companion information ***

Save details of people who frequently fly with you and save time for future flight bookings.

*** General optimization and bug fixes ***

*** Language & Region Settings ***

Language and region selection is now aligned as per the iOS standard approach. These app settings are now defined (and can be set) via your device settings.

"*** Fix provided for payment with credit card. ***

8.6.0

*** Language & Region Settings ***

Language and region selection is now aligned as per the iOS standard approach. These app settings are now defined (and can be set) via your device settings."
